about_the_game:
Monster Hunter Rise Extra Tracks II is an album made up of 24 additional tracks featuring music and remixes originally found in the BGM DLC sets!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
